Translations.Text: Ma nnan asen: "yyaw, ad issuter Umazan n Oebbi a ppeppusemmeem", ad bernen iqweooa nnsen, a ten twaliv wexxoen s tem$weo
Iauva fellasen tessutrev, ne$ ur tessutrev ad ppusemmeen. Ur sen Ipsemmie Oebbi, d awez$i. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu agdud iballa$en
Nitni i iqqaoen: "ur pseddiqet, i wid iddan akked Umazan n Oebbi, alamma mmebruzzaen". N Oebbi igerrujen igenwan akked tmurt, maca ixabiten ur meiuen
Qqaoen: "ma nu$al ar Lmadina, war ccekk, uzmir ad issuffe$, segs, uohif". Tazmert, n Oebbi akked Umazan iS, akked lmumnin, maca, ixabiten ur eoin
A wid iumnen! Â£uowat a kwen ssbaaden, af usmekti n Oebbi, wayla nnwen akked tarwa nnwen! Wid igan akka, ihi, widak d imexsuoen
Ssedqet seg wayen i wen Nefka, uqbel a d tas tmeppant ar yiwen degwen, ad yini: "a Mass iw! Lemmer ad iyi Teswexxoev ar lajel aqoib, ad seddqe$, ad ili$ seg wid imaanen
Ur Irennu Oebbi di laameo, d awez$i, ma iusa d lajel is. Oebbi Ippuxebbeo $ef wayen txeddmem
